TestCase.name: testCoGroupTableValuedAggregate
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCoGroupTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[l1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[l1 AS _l0, l2 AS _l1, l1]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[r1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[r1 AS _r0, r2 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2, r1]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

StreamExecCoGroupTableValuedAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testCoNonGroupTableValuedAggregate
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCoGroupTableValuedAggregate(coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecCalc(select=[l1 AS _l0, l2 AS _l1]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecCalc(select=[r1 AS _r0, r2 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

StreamExecCoGroupTableValuedAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testCoGroupTableValuedAggregateWithRetract
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCoGroupTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[l1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[l1 AS _l0, TMP_0 AS _l1, l1]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[l1], select=[l1, StringLast(l2) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[l1]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[r1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[r1 AS _r0, TMP_1 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2, r1]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[r1], select=[r1, StringLast(r2) AS TMP_1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[r1]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

StreamExecCoGroupTableValuedAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])
